remarks: Lemma for Pigeonhole Principle.  Equinumerosity of successors implies equinumerosity of the original natural numbers.  (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1998.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2015.)
statement:
phplem2.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
phplem2.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
phplem4 $p |- ( ( A e. _om /\ B e. _om ) -> ( suc A ~~ suc B -> A ~~ B ) ) $.
